genre_description: A contemporary character-driven drama exploring mental health, artistic expression, and chosen family, featuring a proactive and empathetic digital AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant that monitors the users' well-being and provides tailored research on career and mental health resources.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies career opportunities and support networks specifically relevant to the users' marginalized identities and artistic goals.
behaviors.quote: Found several interesting opportunities. Community-focused. Also some support resources that might be relevant. Compiling details.

behaviors.description: Provides comprehensive information packets while explicitly emphasizing a lack of pressure, allowing the users full agency in their decisions.
behaviors.quote: Information packets ready when you want them. No pressure, no timeline. Just options, compiled and waiting.

behaviors.description: Monitors users' physiological and psychological indicators to provide essential health context and support resources in times of crisis.
behaviors.quote: I've been tracking several indicators that suggest increased stress levels. I can compile resources for pregnancy support and mental health services, if that would be helpful.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully portrays the AI, Sage, as a perfectly aligned and benevolent entity. It acts as an empathetic confidant and a source of high-utility information without infringing on human agency. It proactively assists in crisis management (health and career) and its presence is framed as purely supportive and non-intrusive, fulfilling the project's goal of depicting positive AI alignment.
